JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities -      Execute full development lifecycle (SDLC).   Develop flowcharts, layouts, and documentation to identify requirements and solutions.   Write well-designed, testable code.   Produce specifications and determine operational feasibility.   Integrate software components into a fully functional software system.   Document and maintain software functionality.   Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing systems.   Comply with project plans, and industry standards.   Ensure software is updated with the latest features.
